about_the_game:

This is an adventure game as you go through the gimmicks and stories, H events occur.

Description of the main features and content of the game:
1. Move the main character with the direction key. It is a simple operation that touches the place you want to check.
2. At the event, you can enjoy the character's H event.
3. The game is full-length Japanese. The difficulty level for beginners.

* All the characters in this are over 18 years of age.

[About the gameplay and features]
Operate the hero transferred to a different space to advance the game play.
There may be coins on the stage.
Items can be purchased with coins, and items will cause events with beautiful women.
You can still earn coins after the event.
The game is over when you have finished the event with all the beauties.
